name: Toys Squad
description:
The house is our battlefield. Our fellow soldiers are looking forward to our coming, let's break through the defense lines to find them!
Beware of the yellow army and mechas, but please don't worry about that, you are the best of the best!
Remember that each of us has our own characteristic features, so fight wisely and keep trying. With our perseverance, we can do anything!

Game Features:
- Gather Your Green Army Men
Childhood never changes, continue your unfinished adventure in TPS combat.

- Play Like A Toy
Cross the house and liberate new areas from the yellow army.

- Fight Like A Soldier
We are the ones who will never be broken!

- Battle With 1 Finger
1 Finger is enough, easy to start!
 
- Destroy The Mecha
Defeat the evil appliance robots!
 
- Train Your Own Legendary Soldiers
Who is the one and only?

We can't wait any longer! It's time to strap our boots on!
